DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether bioavailability controlled-release test formulation least high commercial reference drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Two-way , Crossover Study Estimate Relative Bioavailability Controlled-release Formulation Oxycodone ( 40 mg ) With Sequestered Naltrexone Compared With Immediate-release Oxycodone Tablets ( 20 mg ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer , great 50 kg , able willing sign inform consent Evidence significant illness , condition affect drug absorption , history sleep apnea , allergy opioid drug
